task.title: Cleaning the machine
task.shortdesc: How to clean the ice cream machine after use.

taskbody.context: You'll need a dirty ice cream machine, sink, soap, washcloth and a towel.

step.cmd: Make a sink full of warm, soapy water in the kitchen
Clean the freezer bowl, along with the mixing arm and lid in the sink using the warm soapy water
After you wash all of the machine parts, wipe down the motor base with a damp washcloth
Continue to dry all parts thoroughly with a towel
WARNING: DO NOT IMMERSE THE MOTOR BASE IN WATER OR CLEAN ANY OF THE PARTS WITH ABRASIVE CLEANERS/HARD IMPLEMENTS
